channel.title: [317][delta] creating a new title
channel.description:
i want to create the donator title, so i wasnt quite sure how, i got one of my titles "mem" and i searched it, i copied the code every time i found "member" and pasted it right below and changed anything that said "member in one of the 2 codes to donator, i did this in client, player, and player handler, now every time i try to create a new character it sorta goes to a black screen, and then logs out, if i try to log in it says your acc is already logged in, i go to my character files and nothing is there, (no new accs, if i try to log into an old acc same thing happens). the files will show up in my automatic save folder though. please help o in the auto save file and the character file "member" title is gone =/ please help thanks, o one last think if i try to add a command that requires you to be donator, it says variable not found..
thanks again

item.title: [317][delta] creating a new title
item.dc:creator: @jwags jwags
item.description:
@jwags wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:2, topic:406421”]Create a int,
make it save to the players file (so it save’s weather they have donator status or not.)[/quote] i believe i did create an int for it, how would i make it save donator

Read full topic

item.title: [317][delta] creating a new title
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Create a int,
make it save to the players file (so it save’s weather they have donator status or not.)

Read full topic
